description: This file handles server-side rendering and request handling for a Remix application. It manages different responses depending on whether the request is from a bot or a browser, sets CORS headers, and utilizes React server-side streaming.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main exported function to handle incoming HTTP requests, configure headers, and delegate to specific handlers based on user-agent.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot requests utilizing React's streaming SSR.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server responses for browser requests with streaming SSR.
